channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12106] Move test annotations to test artifact
item.description: Test annotation interfaces used to be under hbase-common/src/test then moved to hbase-annotations/src/main. We should move them to hbase-annotations/src/test.
item.summary: Move test annotations to test artifact

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Can I get a review? Fairly trivial patch.
I'm going to need to commit an addendum momentarily to get 'mvn test' passing with this change

Attached addendum I pushed to 0.98+. We need to add hbase-annotations as a test-jar dep to hbase-testing-util or 'mvn test' will fail at that module. This is from a 0.98 build:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:2.12-TRUNK-HBASE-2:test (secondPartTestsExecution) on project hbase-testing-util: Execution secondPartTestsExecution of goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:2.12-TRUNK-HBASE-2:test failed: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException; nested exception is java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: null: Unable to load category: org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MediumTests -> [Help 1]
